-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Configuration types, parsers & renderers for AWS services
--   
@package aws-configuration-tools
@version 0.1.0.0


module Configuration.Utils.Aws.Credentials
data CredentialConfigKey
CredentialConfigKey :: !ByteString -> !ByteString -> CredentialConfigKey
_credentialConfigKeyId :: CredentialConfigKey -> !ByteString
_credentialConfigKeySecret :: CredentialConfigKey -> !ByteString
credentialConfigKeyId :: Lens' CredentialConfigKey ByteString
credentialConfigKeySecret :: Lens' CredentialConfigKey ByteString
validateCredentialConfigKey :: ConfigValidation CredentialConfigKey λ
data CredentialConfigFile
CredentialConfigFile :: !FilePath -> !Text -> CredentialConfigFile
_credentialConfigFileName :: CredentialConfigFile -> !FilePath

-- | default value is <tt>"default"</tt>
_credentialConfigKeyName :: CredentialConfigFile -> !Text
credentialConfigFileName :: Lens' CredentialConfigFile FilePath
credentialConfigKeyName :: Lens' CredentialConfigFile Text
validateCredentialConfigFile :: ConfigValidation CredentialConfigFile λ

-- | When parsed from configuration files or the command line the settings
--   take the following precedence:
--   
--   Explicit credential configuration gets precedence over credential file
--   configuration which has precedence over loading the credentials from
--   the environment over loading the credentials from the instance meta
--   data.
--   
--   Any setting on the command line always has precedence over any setting
--   in a configuration file.
--   
--   If the configured file does not exist an parse error is triggered. Set
--   this value of <a>_credentialConfigFile</a> to <a>Nothing</a> if you
--   don't want to suppress this error.
data CredentialConfig
CredentialConfig :: !(Maybe CredentialConfigKey) -> !(Maybe CredentialConfigFile) -> !Bool -> !Bool -> CredentialConfig
_credentialConfigKey :: CredentialConfig -> !(Maybe CredentialConfigKey)
_credentialConfigFile :: CredentialConfig -> !(Maybe CredentialConfigFile)
_credentialConfigEnvironment :: CredentialConfig -> !Bool
_credentialConfigInstanceMetadata :: CredentialConfig -> !Bool
credentialConfigKey :: Lens' CredentialConfig (Maybe CredentialConfigKey)
credentialConfigFile :: Lens' CredentialConfig (Maybe CredentialConfigFile)
credentialConfigEnvironment :: Lens' CredentialConfig Bool
credentialConfigInstanceMetadata :: Lens' CredentialConfig Bool
defaultCredentialConfig :: CredentialConfig

-- | A command-line argument parser for <a>CredentialConfig</a>. The
--   <tt>prefix</tt> argument will be prepended directly onto the argument
--   names.
pCredentialConfig :: String -> MParser CredentialConfig

-- | This is <a>pCredentialConfig</a> with an empty prefix.
pCredentialConfig_ :: MParser CredentialConfig
validateCredentialConfig :: ConfigValidation CredentialConfig λ

-- | Load Credentials according to the credential configuration
--   
--   Credentials are loaded with a precedence according to the order of the
--   record fields of <a>CredentialConfig</a>:
--   
--   <ol>
--   <li><a>_credentialConfigKey</a>, loads the explicitely specified
--   credentials,</li>
--   <li><a>_credentialConfigFile</a>, loads credentials with the given key
--   name from the given file,</li>
--   <li><a>_credentialConfigEnvironment</a>, loads credentials from the
--   environment varialbes <tt>AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID</tt> and
--   <tt>AWS_ACCESS_KEY_SECRET</tt>), and</li>
--   <li><a>_credentialConfigInstanceMetadata</a>, load the credentials
--   from the EC2 instance metadata.</li>
--   </ol>
--   
--   It is an error if a particular method is specified in the
--   configuration but loading the credentials with that methods fails.
credentialsFromConfig :: (MonadError LoadCredentialsException m, MonadIO m) => CredentialConfig -> m Credentials
data LoadCredentialsException
LoadCredentialsFromFileFailed :: CredentialConfigFile -> LoadCredentialsException
LoadCredentialsFromEnvironementFailed :: LoadCredentialsException
LoadCredentialsFromInstanceMetadataFailed :: LoadCredentialsException
NoCredentialLoadingMethodSpecified :: LoadCredentialsException
instance Typeable CredentialConfigKey
instance Typeable CredentialConfigFile
instance Typeable LoadCredentialsException
instance Show CredentialConfigKey
instance Read CredentialConfigKey
instance Eq CredentialConfigKey
instance Ord CredentialConfigKey
instance Show CredentialConfigFile
instance Read CredentialConfigFile
instance Eq CredentialConfigFile
instance Ord CredentialConfigFile
instance Show CredentialConfig
instance Eq CredentialConfig
instance Ord CredentialConfig
instance Eq LoadCredentialsException
instance Show LoadCredentialsException
instance Exception LoadCredentialsException
instance FromJSON (CredentialConfig -> CredentialConfig)
instance ToJSON CredentialConfig
instance FromJSON CredentialConfigFile
instance ToJSON CredentialConfigFile
instance FromJSON CredentialConfigKey
instance ToJSON CredentialConfigKey
